content:
Rabit Goes to a
 Party 
 
 Mozambican folktale
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Once upon a time, the 
 
 animals decided to have a 
 
 party. But it was not for al 
 
 of them. It was only for the 
 
 animals that had horns. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The rabit was geting 
 
 ready for the party. But 
 
 then he found out that the 
 
 party was not for everyone. 
 
 It was just for animals with 
 
 horns. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The rabit went 
 
 somewhere and got some 
 
 horns. Then he put them on 
 
 his head and went to the 
 
 party. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 During the party the rabit 
 
 ate and drank and danced. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This made him tired and he 
 
 fel down in the sun. But 
 
 while the rabit was 
 
 sleping, the horns fel of! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then al the animals 
 
 discovered that the rabit 
 
 was not the kind of animal 
 
 they wanted. So they puled 
 
 his ears til they got biger 
 
 and biger. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then they ran away. And 
 
 thatâ€™s the reason why 
 
 rabits have big ears! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7
